    LOUISE FILI DECEMBER HOLIDAY SPECIAL

    Give The Bolted Book for the December holidays — with a handwritten touch by esteemed graphic designer Louise Fili!

    We asked Louise if she would help us come up with a way to present the facsimile as a gift for the holidays when the facsimile itself wouldn’t yet be available.

    Louise chose two images from The Bolted Book and adapted them into a gift card. Then she generously added a special personal touch. Known for her graceful and distinctive handwriting, she will write on the card the name of the sender and the name of the recipient you choose, and we will ensure delivery of the card BY DECEMBER 23, 2016.

    - Card is 3 x 4 inches with a different image from The Bolted Book printed on each side. Comes in a 3 1/4 x 4 7/8-inch vellum “see through” decorative envelope, via US Mail in a postal envelope specified by Louise.

    - Greeting on the card reads: “BUONE FESTE! A copy of Fortunato Depero’s Bolted Book will be sent to you from Italy in the coming year.“

    - Includes, in July, one copy of The Bolted Book Facsimile + Reader’s Guide. Your name, or the name of your choosing, will be featured on an acknowledgments page in the Reader’s Guide.

    Ships to continental U.S. addresses only.

    In order to ensure delivery of the gift card BY DECEMBER 23, 2016, immediately after you have backed this reward, please email info@designersandbooks.com with 1) the name of the gift card sender, 2) the name of the recipient, and 3) the address to which you would like the gift card sent (continental U.S. addresses only). Put "Holiday Special" in the email subject line.

Frequently Asked Questions
  • How do I pledge?
    Enter your pledge amount and select a reward. On the next page we'll ask you to log in or sign up with Kickstarter, and then enter your payment information to complete the checkout process.
  • When is my card charged?
    If this project is successfully funded, your card will be charged on Thu, Dec 1 2016 11:59 pm EST, along with all the other backers of this project.
  • So I'm only charged if funding succeeds?
    Yes! That's part of what makes Kickstarter special. If a project isn't successfully funded, no one pays anything.
  • What can others see about my pledge?
    The project will be added to the list of backings on your profile page, but the amount you pledge, and the reward you choose, will not be made public.
  • What if I want to change my pledge?
    You can change or cancel your pledge anytime before Thu, Dec 1 2016 11:59 pm EST.
  • If this project is funded, how do I get my reward?
    When your reward is ready, Designers & Books will send you a survey via email to request any info needed to deliver your reward (mailing address, T-shirt size, etc).
